name: A REMINDER TO BE REPEATED LIKE A MANTRA
description: From 2015 to 2019 I've pasted up stickers like this one ("stop sabotaging yourself"), mostly on places I'd pass by on my daily commute, and I called them "Uncomfortable Reminders", since that's what they were. It became a habit and some of the phrases I wrote became kind of personal mantras. They've inspired other creations, such as the poem I'm reciting here and, recently, my NFT series of sticker-gifs. :: find more of my work as a writer and spoken word poet on my IG @blueskozmico
